name: Fortress Goon

auras.raw_description:
(Unlocks at Ascension Level 3)
Increases Ally DEF in Dungeons for 23%

skills.name: Cruel Trap
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 15% chance of placing a 15% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on [DEF][ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Devastating Wounds
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Has a 40% chance of placing a 50% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on [DEF][ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 7 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Mobile Fort
skills.raw_description:
Heals all allies by 10% of their MAX HP. Places a 30% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

seo.description: Ogryn-Tribes is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 25 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Subhuman giants with prodigious bellies and brawn, Ogryns arenonetheless sluggish, dumb brutes prone to servitude. Yet theseterrifying great oafs often prove that brute force and ignorancewill often win the day. Together with the Skinwalkers they controlFelwin's Gate, entry to the Kingdom of Aravia.

seo.description: Fortress Goon is a rare def champion from the faction Ogryn Tribes doing magic damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.
